included: 4 nights’ accommodation according tour plan. If one accommodation is already full, you will stay in a similar accommodation of the same category.
Meals according tour plan (5 x Break fasts)
Transportation from arrival to departure (air-conditioned vehicle, public transportation such as bus or train, 4x4 Safari Jeep, bicycle, tuk-tuk, Boat)
Fees for Yala Safari entrance ticket, jeep and guide/ Ella Train tickets/ Kandy Temple entrance, cultural show/ Village Safari /

Day1.description: Breakfast in Galle–Explore Dutch heritage in Galle by tuk-tuk and you will explore historical importance  of Galle Fort. The ramparts, colonial buildings, clock tower, light house, museum & old church, mosque  & Buddhist temple are covered in this guided tour.  After lunch we are heading to colombo for site seeing the Red Mosque and other attractions in  Colombo. After a mouthwatering Banana Leaf dinner, driver will drop you at the airport for departure  flight
